description: s(3n), s=A054086; also a bisection of A003511.
formula: a(n) = floor( n*(1+sqrt 3) ) = n+floor(n*sqrt 3). - _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 26 2011a(n) = n+A022838(n). - _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 25 2015
maple: A054088 := proc(n) floor(n*(1+sqrt(3))) ; end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 26 2011
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: A-number in the definition corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 05 2008
